overview: Susan has the world on a string, and when she finds herself featured in a personal ad, she has the Esquire family jewels in the palm of her hand. Unaware she has filched a fabulous fortune, that light-hearted, light-fingered lady goes in search of her classified Casanovas. Rochelle, who has designs on a piece of Susan's good fortune, runs head-on into Susan, and some madcap antics begin to unfold.
title: Once Upon a Madonna
